awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 22 nominations.

fullplot: Based on the bestseller by Marion Zimmer Bradley It tells the story of the women behind King Arthur; including his mother, Igraine; his half-sister, Morgaine; his aunt Viviane, the Lady of the Lake; and his wife, Gwenwyfar.
